solution_line_template: Mr Cruz's total weight gain in the two months is {weight_gain_month1} + {weight_gain_month2} = <<{weight_gain_month1}+{weight_gain_month2}={total_weight_gain}>>{total_weight_gain} pounds.

If he initially weighed {original_weight} pounds, his total weight after the two months is {original_weight} + {total_weight_gain} = <<{original_weight}+{total_weight_gain}={final_weight}>>{final_weight} pounds
